name: CleverSailing HD Lite - Sailboat Racing Game for iPad
name_original: CleverSailing HD Lite - Sailboat Racing Game for iPad
description:
Car races are history – discover a new game world with CleverSailing! This is the ultimate game for iPAD. Play, have fun and learn something new all at the same time! Even professionals appreciate it! Get now the most innovative game app of the year.

FEATURES:
• Easy handling, tough racing.
• Seven different boat classes, all with realistic behaviour.
• Sail trim manual or auto.
• Nice sailing spots with true wind pattern -> San Francisco, Virgin Islands, Palma, Cannes, Kiel, Warnemünde, Valencia, Lago di Garda, Perth
• Up-to-date racing courses.
• Perfect sailing in big Cups, time trial or randomly.
• Language: ENGLISH / GERMAN
